document_data.mainbody:
he Living Seat was one of the thrones of the Coronal of Cormanthyr. It was situated on the Isle of Estel.
The Living Seat had a number of powers, which could be called upon by the mantle of the Coronal when they were close by, owing to unique enchantments. Such powers included the ability to bar any liquid or vapor, from rain to a green dragons breath, from anywhere within a small area centered on the throne or mantle, and a few evocation spells such as flame strike.
In the , the Living Seat was in Coronal Eltargrim Irithyls chambers instead of the isle of Estel.
